job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtWe are looking for an innovative software engineer to help us build the futureltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis position willltpgtltpgt Create new features and fix bugsltpgtltpgt Collaborate with the product owner and other developersltpgtltpgt Operate with minimal oversight to develop code the matches provided requirementsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe preferred candidate hasltpgtltpgt Desire to contribute energy to building great technology solutionsltpgtltpgt Entrepreneurial collaborative spirit needed to work in a distributed startup cultureltpgtltpgt Practical experience designing scalable applications for web andor mobileltpgtltpgt Effective verbal written communication skillsltpgtltpgt Experience with Angular Node and MongoDB requiredltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis is not an entrylevel position  you need to be able to hit the ground runningltpgtltpgtHowever capabilities are far more important than credentialsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis is a fulltime W2 100 remote positionltpgtltpgtCandidates in Florida Ohio or Utah are preferredltpgtltpgtPrivate Auto LLC offers employees medical and dental insuranceltpgtltpgtCandidates must be legally authorized to work in the US No visa sponsorshipsltpgt
